David's statement also seemed a bit generic, but I'm not sure if that's just my paranoia kicking in. As for Eve, she seems reasonable enough, but I do wonder if she's being a bit too cooperative. 

As for who might be Hitler, I have no idea at this point. It's still too early to make any educated guesses. But if I had to pick someone who might be a fascist, I'd say Charlie or Bob are possibilities. They just seem a bit too enthusiastic about giving Eve a chance to lead, and I worry that they might be trying to further their own agenda.
